Class ServiceTestCase

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.hshn.mi.pdbg.basicservice.BasicDBServiceTestCase
      • de.hshn.mi.pdbg.basicservice.ServiceTestCase

  • public class ServiceTestCase
extends BasicDBServiceTestCase
    ServiceTestCase provides methods to test common features of a BasicDBService object.
    Version:
    1.0

    • Method Detail

      • testService

        public void testService()
        This test checks if the BasicDBService is available.

      • testStoreNull

        public void testStoreNull()
        Tries to store a null value. The test is passed if the BasicDBService.store(PersistentObject) throws an AssertionError.

        Involved methods:

        • BasicDBService.store(PersistentObject)

      • testMaliciousPersistentObjectImpl

        public void testMaliciousPersistentObjectImpl()
        This test checks if its possible to store an MaliciousPersistentObjectImpl. To pass the test, the BasicDBService.store(PersistentObject) must throw a StoreException.

        Involved methods:

        • BasicDBService.store(PersistentObject)
